subject: RE: [junit] Re: how to use ExceptionTestCase ?
msgSnippet: On Sat, 31 May 2003 13:19:49 -0400, J. B. Rainsberger ... I ll throw in another vote for Smalltalk Best Practices.  It s definitely worth it, for any
messageBody:
On Sat, 31 May 2003 13:19:49 -0400, "J. B. Rainsberger"
<jbrains@...> said:
> That's the one. I haven't read Kent's book, although I definitely should.
> One day....

I'll throw in another vote for Smalltalk Best Practices. It's definitely
worth it, for any language. Of course, you MAY not be able to do
everything in every language (at least not as "loverly" -- try applying
it to Perl), but it has great ideas in general!

--
=jason
